JSci.awt
Class LineGraph

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          JSci.awt.DoubleBufferedCanvas
              JSci.awt.Graph2D
                  JSci.awt.LineGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, GraphDataListener
public class LineGraph
extends Graph2D

A line graph AWT component. There is some support for the handling of NaN values.

See Also:
Serialized Form
